description: This file defines the interface `IFbSettings` within the namespace `WPEFramework::Exchange`. It is a minimal stub interface intended to satisfy build-time dependencies for the FbSettings component, containing pure virtual methods for managing device settings and subscriptions for notifications related to device configuration.

classes.name: IFbSettings
classes.description: Interface for Facebook settings and notifications, providing methods to handle device info and event subscriptions.

methods.name: HandleAppEventNotifier
methods.description: Handles registration or unregistration for application event notifications.

methods.name: SubscribeOnCountryCodeChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from changes to the country code.

methods.name: SubscribeOnTimeZoneChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes from time zone change notifications.

methods.name: GetSecondScreenFriendlyName
methods.description: Retrieves the second screen friendly name.

methods.name: SubscribeOnFriendlyNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes to friendly name change notifications.

methods.name: SubscribeOnDeviceNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribes or unsubscribes to device name change notifications.

methods.name: SetName
methods.description: Sets a generic name value, used as a legacy helper.

methods.name: AddAdditionalInfo
methods.description: Adds additional info to the device configuration.

ctags.name: IFbSettings
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IFbSettings : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
